statements: SELECT user_id, user_name, latitude, longitude FROM user_locations;
SELECT * FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, longitude, latitude FROM user_locations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM user_locations ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_name FROM user_locations WHERE longitude < -70 ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, latitude, longitude FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, latitude, longitude FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM user_locations WHERE latitude BETWEEN 10.0 AND 20.0;
SELECT user_id, user_name, latitude, longitude FROM user_locations WHERE user_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT user_name, longitude FROM user_locations ORDER BY user_name DESC, longitude ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM user_locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, location_name FROM user_locations ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT activity_name, activity_date FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 7 ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_users FROM user_locations;
SELECT user_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM user_locations
SELECT * FROM user_locations WHERE location_name='New York'
SELECT user_id, activity_name, activity_date FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_date DESC
SELECT location_name, longitude, latitude FROM user_locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -80
SELECT user_id, activity_name, activity_date FROM user_activity WHERE activity_name LIKE '%swimming%'
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, location_id FROM user_location_mapping WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, location_name FROM users INNER JOIN locations ON users.location_lat = locations.location_lat AND users.location_long = locations.location_long;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE location_lat > 40.0;
SELECT location_name, location_lat, location_long FROM locations WHERE location_lat < 30.0;
SELECT user_id, location_id, timestamp FROM user_location_mapping WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_location_mapping ON users.user_id = user_location_mapping.user_id;
SELECT user_id, location_name FROM users INNER JOIN locations ON users.location_lat = locations.location_lat;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE location_lat > 40.0;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE show_popular_locations = TRUE;
SELECT location_name, location_lat, location_long FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, location_id FROM user_favorites WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE location_lat < 0;
SELECT username, location_lat, location_long FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;

SELECT u.username, l.location_name, l.location_lat, l.location_long FROM users u JOIN user_favorites uf ON u.user_id = uf.user_id JOIN locations l ON uf.location_id = l.location_id WHERE l.location_lat < 0 ORDER BY u.username ASC, l.location_name DESC;

SELECT u.username, l.location_name, up.theme_color FROM users u JOIN user_favorites uf ON u.user_id = uf.user_id JOIN locations l ON uf.location_id = l.location_id JOIN user_preferences up ON u.user_id = up.user_id WHERE up.show_popular_locations = true ORDER BY u.username ASC;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, age FROM Users WHERE age >= 18;
SELECT user_id, location_lat, location_long FROM Users WHERE location_lat != 0;
SELECT user_id, theme FROM UserPreferences JOIN Users ON UserPreferences.user_id = Users.user_id;
SELECT connection_id, connection_status FROM UserConnections WHERE connection_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE location_lat BETWEEN -90 AND 90 AND location_long BETWEEN -180 AND 180 ORDER BY location_lat DESC
SELECT DISTINCT u.username, ua.activity_type FROM Users u JOIN UserActivity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id WHERE ua.timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY u.username ASC, ua.timestamp DESC

SELECT u.username, COUNT(uc.connected_user_id) AS connections_count FROM Users u LEFT JOIN UserConnections uc ON u.user_id = uc.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING connections_count > 2 ORDER BY connections_count DESC

SELECT u.username, COUNT(ua.activity_type) AS activity_count FROM Users u LEFT JOIN UserActivity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id WHERE ua.timestamp > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY u.username HAVING activity_count > 1 ORDER BY activity_count ASC
